name: NavaWeb Design & Digital Marketing Agency
tagline: Vancouver Web Design and Marketing Agency
description:
NavaWeb is a full-service web design and marketing agency located in Vancouver, BC, that was founded by Elyssa Manis in 2007 (formerly Vesign Solutions).
From entrepreneurs and business owners to high-level professionals, we pride ourselves in helping companies get their business online and owners connected with their customers with engaging content and design. Our mission is to fuse great web design, customer service, and affordability together for our clients.
